Title: Title
contact_description: Get notified about our latest projects, read interesting stories about mission work, and see the newest available Bibles.
contact_privacy_policy_call: We never sell your data, share your email, or spam you.
index_caption: connects the efforts of Bible publishers, translators, content creators, donors and Christian workers worldwide  to ensure that God’s Word is readily available for those who need it most.
index_intro_text: Free Bible downloads, extensive curated libraries in over twenty languages, Audio Bible players, a burgeoning print–on-demand program, and our ongoing data-share initiative are just a few ways we can help you share God's Word. Look around and if you've got questions - get in touch.
index_volunteer_description: Help us out by submitting an issue or by adding to our data aggregation projects on github. Not a Programmer? There's still plenty of ways to help! Sharing the good news about free scripture content, working on a Transcription Project, or simply by donating.
verse_matthew_24_14: And this Gospel of the Kingdom will be proclaimed throughout the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
verse_psalm_68_11: The Lord gave the word: great was the company of those that published it.

menu.about_tagline: Welcome to the ministry pages of the Digital Bible Society. We're glad you're here. We hope you will join us in Sharing Biblical Resources, adopting a Project, or Praying with us as the Word of God grows and multiplies around the world.
